channel.title: How to add a object teleport
channel.description:
yes neil1111 another question :)
right.. i want to add a donaters portal from my home place so it will be like a pestcontroll type portal you click onit takes you to an island or place that is unaccesable to players and im going to add a skilling area...shops with rares ect inn and a shop with custom in (when i get my bloody add model command to work)

item.source: How to add a object teleport

item.title: How to add a object teleport
item.dc:creator: @neil1111 neil1111
item.description:
@neil1111 wrote:

um search case 2492 in actionhandler, and under the break add that. if you get errors then remove it and ill try figure a way out, the x and y thats in the case are just for teleing to you dont need the from coords. just make the portal an object.

case 2492: if (c.killCount >= 20) { c.getDH().sendOption4("Armadyl", "Bandos", "Saradomin", "Zamorak"); c.dialogueAction = 20; } else { c.sendMessage("You need 20 kill count before teleporting to a boss chamber."); } break; case oooo: if (c.donated = 1) { c.getPA().movePlayer(xxxx, yyyy, 0); } else { c.sendMessage("You need to be a donator to get through here"); } break; it should look like that.

Read full topic

item.title: How to add a object teleport
item.dc:creator: @neil1111 neil1111
item.description:
@neil1111 wrote:

Um i think it would be like this

case oooo: if (c.donated = 1) { c.getPA().movePlayer(xxxx, yyyy, 0); } else { c.sendMessage("You need to be a donator to get through here"); } break;
where oooo is the portal id
xxxx is the X coord of where you want to go and yyyy is the Y coords of where you want to go.
but not sure, i just made this from my godwars portal.

Read full topic
